attributes.action: Make our politicians responsible for their actions & prevent individuals in government who have made serious errors in judgement from remaining in their position or from being transferred to a different department to repeat their mistakes.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
How many times have individuals in our government been involved in scandals or serious incompetence only to be given a slap on the wrist or moved to a different department to repeat their mistakes? 
If an individual wishes to be in such a position of power they should be competent and act in a way which is compatible with their position morally. 
Had some of the scandal and incompetence that exists within the government happened within a private company, many heads would have rolled by now. 
Members of government that are involved in serious mistakes/scandal should be removed from their position of power and prevented from re-entering the government either permanently or for a considerable period of time. 
The introduction of this natural selection process could provide our country with a much needed increase in the standard of our key decision makers.

reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
